definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: (etym. & mng. dub.; Thes foundation (cf. Talm. AW), fr. [[אֵם]] in metaph. sense, cf. MV; De on Is 6:4 der. similarly, but makes support of superliminaria (cf. LXX SyrVer Vulgate); Ew Di der. fr. √ [[אמם]] = 0’am=a precede, whence 0’imamun front; Dl:Pr 110 tr. holder fr. √ [[אמם]] be wide, hence contain, hold) only [[אַמּוֹת הַסִּפִּים]] Is 6:4.
